title: LBoL Logs
subtitle: Run History Sharing
description: LBoL Logs is a run history sharing service of Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend.
underConstruction: This site is under construction. It is opened for demo purpose.
about:
LBoL Logs is a run history sharing service of Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend (LBoL).
The original run data of the game has limited information and only 50 records are held, so data generated by custom Mod LBoL Run Logger (WIP) is used instead.
Feedback are welcome here.

keys.mod: Mod exported log contents  (not published yet)

site: Run history page (summary, map, route, change, holdings)
Language switch (sorry for my poor English)
mod: Exhibits revealed (except events and shops), acquired, lost, consumed
Cards revealed (except events and shops), acquired, lost, upgraded
Change of HP/Max HP, P/Max P, Gold
Enemy encounts (name and # of turns only)

later: Auto reflect uploaded logs to top page list
Image of Vengeful Spirits, Menreikis and Spirit of Wealth/Elegance
trash: Ads & paid features (Free of ads and free to use)

value: No cookie is collected. (Language preference is saved in cookie yet.)
No private information, such as PC information, Steam account information, payment information is collected by the Mod nor included in the generated data.
Although validation is performed before uploading, no responsibility will be accepted for user accidentially uploading private information.
